trackingId.Description: The tracking ID for the event. The ID is generated by a call to the CreateEventTracker API.

userId.Description: The user associated with the event.

sessionId.Description: The session ID associated with the user's visit. Your application generates the sessionId when a user first visits your website or uses your application. Amazon Personalize uses the sessionId to associate events with the user before they log in. For more information, see Recording Events .

eventList.Description: A list of event data from the session.

datasetArn.Description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Items dataset you are adding the item or items to.
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Users dataset you are adding the user or users to.
